column5: Come fish renown Baffin Bay grass flats/reefs for Trophy trout and reds  Your stay will include 2 Hobie outback kayaks with mirage drive, Life vest, stakeout pole & cart to transport to the beach.   At night relax outside or play a game of jenga with our super sized set  Contact me if you will have additional people not needing a kayak during your stay for correct pricing.
column8: Fish from Kayak - Baffin Bay for trophy trout/reds
